title.rendered: This is how the groups of the Qatar 2022 World Cup were

content.rendered:
This Friday, April 1, 2022, the draw was held that defined the initial groups of the World Cup Qatar 2022. The event was held in Doha, Qatar.

In the main areas —Conmebol, Concacaf and UEFA— there is a lot to play for and nothing is defined for many countries that more than a year ago seemed favorites to settle in the World Cup.

This morning the official song for the Qatar 2022 World Cup was announced, named Hayya Hayya (Better together) and the mascot: La’eeb.

Mexico as one of the participating nations is presented at the start of the 2022 FIFA World Cup Main Draw in Doha, Qatar, 01 April 2022 | PHOTO: EFE/EPA/NOUSHAD THEKKAYIL

World champions Lothar Matthäus, from Germany; and Cafu, from Brazil headed the list of guests for the draw and were in charge of selecting the teams that made up the groups of the world cup qatar 2022.

Today they will select 29 teams that are already classified, and there are three teams left to define that will be decided in a playoff. Teams are yet to play games because games were delayed due to COVID-19.

Group A

  • qatar
  • Ecuador
  • Senegal
  • Netherlands

B Group

  • England
  • Iran
  • USA
  • Will arrive from the playoffs (Wales, Scotland or Ukraine)

Group C

  • Argentina
  • Saudi Arabia
  • Mexico
  • Poland

Group D

  • France
  • It will arrive from the playoff (Peru, Australia or United Arab Emirates)
  • Denmark
  • Tunisia

Group E

  • Spain
  • Will arrive from the playoff (Costa Rica or New Zealand)
  • Germany
  • Japan

Group F

  • Belgium
  • Canada
  • Morocco
  • Croatia

Group G

  • Brazil
  • Serbian
  • Swiss
  • Cameroon

Group H

  • Portugal
  • Ghana
  • Uruguay
  • South Korea

World Cup dates 2022

  • Group stage: From November 21 to December 2
  • Round of 16: From December 3 to 6
  • Quarterfinals: December 9 and 10
  • Semifinals: December 13 and 14
  • Third and fourth place: December 17
  • Final: December 18
